Text: where do you get games from before anyone else. school me please?
Sometimes places sell games before they are released...mostly mom and pop video game stores. i know a few around me, once they receive them they ignore the "do not sell before" stickers.

so this is more of topic with the gameplay rather than the torrent. i burned and have been playing for a few hours and this game sucks. the graphics are horrible and everything seems messed up. and that IS taking into consideration that this is a WHOLE different setup. Everything looks VERY smoothed out but absolutely no detail. it looks like something made in the 64 of ps1 days. and the gameplay even with all the new features seems dull. maybe i just played 10 too much. what does everyone else think?
when i download a torrent i end up with loads of files in a folder what should i do from there can anyone help me thanks.

nffctom- left click the file and extract with winrar after u unpack with winrar it should give u a .iso and sometimes a dvd file..then run ur .iso file thru abgx to see if it is patched and get the dvd file u need to make ur backup after it is verified burn with imgburn using a dl dvd and the .dvd file (i had a hard time but real easy once you do it)

@fluffy,i think you must have a crap setup because this is better than 10 in every way possible,far better graphics and much more precise gameplay.you did play too much of 10,sure its not still in your box?
